description: Test data for realistic Timesheet workflow: Employee creates → Supervisor approves/rejects

TIMESHEETS_01.test_name: Employee creates timesheet, submits, Supervisor approves
TIMESHEETS_01.description: Complete happy path: Employee → Submit → Supervisor → Approve

TIMESHEETS_02.test_name: Employee submits, Supervisor rejects with comment, Employee resubmits
TIMESHEETS_02.description: Submit → Reject (with comment) → Employee edits → Resubmit → Approve

test_data.rejection_comment: Hours exceed project allocation. Please adjust.

TIMESHEETS_03.test_name: Employee attempts to submit timesheet with empty record
TIMESHEETS_03.description: Employee tries to submit empty timesheet
TIMESHEETS_03.expected_result: Submission blocked - timesheet has no records

TIMESHEETS_04.test_name: Employee creates timesheet for multiple projects and activities
TIMESHEETS_04.description: Multiple project-activity combinations in one timesheet

TIMESHEETS_05.test_name: Check timesheet with decimal hours input
TIMESHEETS_05.description: Employee enters decimal hours in timesheet
TIMESHEETS_05.expected_result: Decimal hours accepted and total calculated correctly

TIMESHEETS_06.test_name: Employee creates timesheet with project without assigned time
TIMESHEETS_06.description: Employee tries to submit timesheet for project with no assigned time
TIMESHEETS_06.expected_result: Save/Submit blocked - no assigned time for project

TIMESHEETS_07.test_name: Employee attempts to enter negative hours in timesheet
TIMESHEETS_07.description: Employee inputs negative hours for a day
TIMESHEETS_07.expected_result: Should Be Less Than 24 and in HH:MM or Decimal Format

TIMESHEETS_08.test_name: Employee attempts to enter hours exceeding 24 in a day
TIMESHEETS_08.description: Employee inputs hours greater than 24 for a day

TIMESHEETS_09.test_name: Employee attempts to enter invalid text format for hours
TIMESHEETS_09.description: Employee inputs non-numeric text for hours
TIMESHEETS_09.expected_result: Should Be Less Than 24 and in HH:MM or Decimal Format

TIMESHEETS_10.test_name: Employee attempts to create timesheet for a future week
TIMESHEETS_10.description: Employee creates timesheet for next week and create timesheet

TIMESHEETS_11.test_name: Check that approved timesheet cannot be edited
TIMESHEETS_11.description: Employee tries to edit timesheet after Supervisor approval
TIMESHEETS_11.expected_result: Edit button disabled or hidden, cannot edit approved timesheet
